movie_title: How bubble tea got its bubbles ⏲️ 6 Minute English
introduction: How did bubble tea get its bubbles? How was this drink invented? Neil and Beth discuss this and teac

vocabulary.definition: a special feature for which something is particularly known
vocabulary.example: His signature dish is a spicy seafood curry.

vocabulary.definition: needing to be chewed a lot before it is soft enough to swallow
vocabulary.example: The caramel candies were too chewy for her.
The company introduced an innovative approach to recycling.

vocabulary.definition: to become quickly known by more and more people
vocabulary.example: The news of the new product spread like wildfire on social media.

vocabulary.definition: a very lucky event that is surprising and unexpected
vocabulary.example: Surviving the accident without any injuries was a miracle.

vocabulary.definition: an informal word in British English for a cup of tea
vocabulary.example: Let's have a cuppa and catch up on the latest news.
